## ReadableGivety.getGivTokenAllowance() method

Get the liquidity mining contract's allowance of a holder's GiveSwap GIVE/GUSD LP tokens.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getGivTokenAllowance(address?: string): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address holding the GiveSwap GIVE/GUSD LP tokens. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt;
